q_en: For Michael's SweaterAndShorts order, which other products have not been manufactured yet? Please list the types, attributes and quantities of unfinished products.

steps.sql: SELECT pt.description AS product_type, p.attributes, op.number AS quantity FROM order_product op JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE c.customer_name = 'Michael' AND o.order_name = 'SweaterAndShorts' AND op.completed_number < op.planned_number;
steps.description: To find the types, attributes, and quantities of unfinished products for the order placed by Michael with the name 'SweaterAndShorts', we need to identify the products that have not been completed yet. We will first find the order_id for the specified order, then retrieve the products that are associated with this order but have not been fully manufactured yet.
